Considerable cloudiness PERIOD Low 41F PERIOD Winds light and variable PERIOD

Updated November     pm





Australias Lucas Herbert reacts to sinking a birdie putt on the fourteenth green during the first round of the PGA Tours Fortinet Championship

Australian Lucas Herbertreeled off six straight birdies before a closing par to grab a twostroke lead after Thursdays first round of the US PGA Tours Fortinet Championship PERIOD

The 27yearold made  birdies against a lone bogey to fire a nineunderpar  at Silverado in Napa California PERIOD

That matched his careerlow 18hole PGA Tour score which he first managed in last years final round of the Zozo Championship PERIOD

 Herbert said PERIOD Felt like I played OK and just got a lot of good breaks and capitalized on chances as well.I felt like coming here I was ready to play again. south Koreas Kim Seonghyeon was second after a bogeyfree  PERIOD

Six players were a further shot back including Englands Harry Hall and South Koreas Kang Sunghoon PERIOD

Herberts only US PGA Tour title came at the  Bermuda Championship PERIOD

But he is a threetime winner on the DP World Tour his most recent in April when he won the ISPS Handa Championship in Japan with a birdie on the second playoff hole to defeat Canadas Aaron Cockerill PERIOD

After birdies at the third and parfive fifth holes Herbert took a bogey at six but answered with a 28foot birdie putt at the seventh and began the back nine with a 24foot birdie putt PERIOD

His epic birdie run twice as long as his prior PGA careerbest streak began with tapins at the parfive twelfth and parfour thirteenth PERIOD

He then sank birdie putts from nine feet at  just inside five feet at the parfive fifteenth and  feet at  and the parthree seventeenth PERIOD

The event launched the PGAs fall season a series of events after the FedEx Cup playoffs and before the start of the  season that primarily allows players outside the seasons top  to qualify for spots on next years tour PERIOD

Among the exceptions was twotime defending champion Max Homa who fired an openinground  PERIOD The world number seven who will play on the US Ryder Cup team later this month seeks his first win since January PERIOD

Justin Thomas another member of the Ryder Cup team shot a threeunder  PERIOD
